notesShort: This character has good lingering hitboxes. Use Speed art and your movement to open them up.
Their recovery is solid but not infallible. Strike them deep offstage to secure a kill early.
Short Hop N-Air will always finish with the -11 landing hitbox. Full Hop N-Air gives Byleth control over whether the landing hitbox comes out, making it impossible to punish on reaction.
Respect both U-Smash and U-Air; they are solid anti-airs that can punish you for hovering over them.
In vanilla, Up-B into B-Air is true around 20-43%. Have Shield art ready if you're by the ledge.
Once you shield an arrow, beware of D-Air shield breaks until it recovers.

fsmash.notes: Precise. Hits at roll distance from ledge.
